pages.text: A $(9)Gem$() is a crystal of condensed strength. When socketed into an affix item, a Gem will provide a powerful attribute bonus whenever the item normally would.

pages.title: Obtaining Gems
pages.text: Gems can be found in chest loot, and may rarely be found when killing mobs. However, for a gem to drop, the killer must be a real player, not a machine or other automation source.$(p)Gems are more likely to drop from Bosses.

pages.title: Socketing Gems
pages.text: To socket a gem into an item, combine the two in a Smithing Table.$(p)Place the item on the left, and the gem on the right.$(p)Socketed gems cannot be removed.
